queryMap.query: SELECT CD_NM AS RACER_PERIO_NO ,CD_NM AS RACER_PERIO_NM FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = 'A10001' ORDER BY CD DESC
SELECT RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,NM_KOR ,NATY_TEAM FROM TBDB_CAND_IDENT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND NM_KOR LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CAND_NO ASC

SELECT RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, NM_KOR, NM_CHN, FC_DEC(RES_NO) AS RES_NO, BIRTH_DT, LUNSOL, FMLY_HEAD_NM_KOR, FMLY_HEAD_NM_CHN, FMLY_HEAD_RELN, TEL_HOME1, TEL_HOME2, TEL_HOME3, CELPON_1, CELPON_2, CELPON_3, LIFE_BASE, HOBY, SPA_ABTY, RELGN, B.CD_NM AS RELGN_NM, MTARY_GBN, C.CD_NM AS MTARY_GBN_NM, ARMY_GBN, D.CD_NM AS ARMY_GBN_NM, ADDR1, ADDR2, POST_NO, PERMNT1, PERMNT2, PERMNT_POST_NO, NATY_TEAM, BUS_TEAM, TRNG_PLC, DRINK, SMOKE, GRDU_GBN, LEAVE_DT, LEAVE_RSN, HGHT, WGHT, SIT_HGHT, BREAST_SIZE, BELLY_CIR, HEAP_SIZE, FEM_RIGHT, FEM_LEFT, LEG_RIGHT, LEG_LEFT, GLS_YN, SIGHT_LEFT, SIGHT_RIGHT, BLOD_TPE, E.CD_NM AS BLOD_TPE_NM, RACER_TPE, F.CD_NM AS RACER_TPE_NM, MAIN_ITEM, G.CD_NM AS MAIN_ITEM_NM, STRATEGY, H.CD_NM AS STRATEGY_NM, LEG_TPE, I.CD_NM AS LEG_TPE_NM, SUMM_PLC, WIN_PLC, TRNG_MAN, STNT_OFFC_ER, J.CD_NM AS STNT_OFFC_ER_NM, ROOM_CHIEF_YN, PTO_FILE, PTO_URL, A.DEL_YN, A.EMAIL, (SELECT SPEC_DESC FROM TBDB_SPEC_DESC WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?) AS SPEC_DESC FROM TBDB_CAND_IDENT A, (SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10011') B ,(SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10015') C ,(SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10016') D ,(SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10070') E ,(SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10069') F ,(SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10026') G ,(SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10033') H ,(SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10034') I ,(SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10023') J WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.RELGN = B.CD(+) AND A.MTARY_GBN = C.CD(+) AND A.ARMY_GBN = D.CD(+) AND A.BLOD_TPE = E.CD(+) AND A.RACER_TPE = F.CD(+) AND A.MAIN_ITEM = G.CD(+) AND A.STRATEGY = H.CD(+) AND A.LEG_TPE = I.CD(+) AND A.STNT_OFFC_ER = J.CD(+)

SELECT '0' CHK, RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, FC_DEC(RES_NO) AS RES_NO, RELN, C.CD_NM AS RELN_NM, NM, SCHL, B.CD_NM AS SCHL_NM, RES_AREA, FMLY_JOB, SEQ FROM TBDB_FMLY A, (SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10013') B , (SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10085') C WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.SCHL = B.CD(+) AND A.RELN = C.CD(+)

SELECT '0' CHK, RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, SCHL_CD, B.CD_NM AS SCHL_CD_NM, SCHL_NM, MJR, MTRIC_YY, GRDU_YY, GRDU_GBN, C.CD_NM AS GRDU_GBN_NM, SEQ FROM TBDB_SCHL_CARR A, (SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10013') B , (SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10014') C WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.SCHL_CD = B.CD(+) AND A.GRDU_GBN = C.CD(+)
SELECT '0' CHK, RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, TOUR_DT, TOUR_NM, ITEM, RANK, SEQ FROM TBDB_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ORDER BY TOUR_DT DESC

SELECT '0' CHK, RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, SEQ, NM, RACER_GBN, B.CD_NM AS RACER_GBN_NM, RELN_GBN, C.CD_NM AS RELN_GBN_NM, DETL_RELN, A.RMK FROM TBDB_RACER_RELN A, (SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10044') B , (SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10071') C WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.RACER_GBN = B.CD(+) AND A.RELN_GBN = C.CD(+) ORDER BY SEQ ASC
SELECT '0' CHK, RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, DT, INVW_CNTNT, INVW_MAN, SEQ FROM TBDB_INVW_CNTNT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ORDER BY DT DESC
SELECT NVL( (MAX(TO_NUMBER(SEQ)) + 1),1) SEQ FROM TBDB_RACER_RELN WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?
SELECT RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SPEC_DESC FROM TBDB_SPEC_DESC WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?
SELECT NVL( (MAX(TO_NUMBER(SEQ)) + 1),1) SEQ FROM TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_SCR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND DT = ?

SELECT '0' CHK, RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, DT, SEQ, PRIZ_PENAL_GBN, B.CD_NM AS PRIZ_PENAL_GBN_NM, A.ITEM_CD, C.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_CD_NM, A.PRIZ_PENAL_CD, D.PRIZ_PENAL_NM, A.ITEM_CD||A.PRIZ_PENAL_CD AS DUM_CD, D.PRIZ_PENAL_NM AS DUM_CD_NM, DISC_CNTNT, PRIZ_SCR, PENAL_SCR, '' TOT_PRIZ_SCR, '' TOT_PENAL_SCR, MANAGE_CNTNT FROM TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_SCR A, (SELECT * FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10018') B ,(SELECT ITEM_CD,ITEM_NM FROM TBDB_ITEM_CD) C ,(SELECT PRIZ_PENAL_CD, ITEM_CD, PRIZ_PENAL_NM FROM TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_CD) D WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.PRIZ_PENAL_GBN = B.CD(+) AND A.ITEM_CD = C.ITEM_CD(+) AND A.PRIZ_PENAL_CD = D.PRIZ_PENAL_CD(+) AND A.ITEM_CD = D.ITEM_CD(+) ORDER BY DT ASC,SEQ ASC
SELECT ITEM_CD, ITEM_NM FROM TBDB_ITEM_CD ORDER BY ITEM_NM ASC
SELECT ITEM_CD||PRIZ_PENAL_CD AS PRIZ_PENAL_CD, ITEM_CD, PRIZ_PENAL_NM, PENAL_SCR, ADD_SCR FROM TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_CD ORDER BY PRIZ_PENAL_NM ASC
SELECT ADD_SCR, PENAL_SCR FROM TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_CD WHERE ITEM_CD = ? AND PRIZ_PENAL_CD = ?

INSERT INTO TBDB_CAND_IDENT ( RACER_PERIO_NO , CAND_NO , NM_KOR , NM_CHN , RES_NO , BIRTH_DT , LUNSOL , FMLY_HEAD_NM_KOR , FMLY_HEAD_NM_CHN , FMLY_HEAD_RELN , TEL_HOME1 , TEL_HOME2 , TEL_HOME3 , CELPON_1 , CELPON_2 , CELPON_3 , LIFE_BASE , HOBY , SPA_ABTY , RELGN , MTARY_GBN , ARMY_GBN , ADDR1 , ADDR2 , POST_NO , PERMNT1 , PERMNT2 , PERMNT_POST_NO , NATY_TEAM , BUS_TEAM , TRNG_PLC , DRINK , SMOKE , GRDU_GBN , LEAVE_DT , LEAVE_RSN , HGHT , WGHT , SIT_HGHT , BREAST_SIZE , BELLY_CIR , HEAP_SIZE , FEM_RIGHT , FEM_LEFT , LEG_RIGHT , LEG_LEFT , GLS_YN , SIGHT_LEFT , SIGHT_RIGHT , BLOD_TPE , RACER_TPE , MAIN_ITEM , STRATEGY , LEG_TPE , SUMM_PLC , WIN_PLC , TRNG_MAN , STNT_OFFC_ER , ROOM_CHIEF_YN , PTO_FILE , PTO_URL , DEL_YN , EMAIL , INST_ID , INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,FC_ENC(?) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,'N' ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDB_CAND_IDENT SET NM_KOR = ? , NM_CHN = ? , RES_NO = FC_ENC(?) , BIRTH_DT = ? , LUNSOL = ? , FMLY_HEAD_NM_KOR = ? , FMLY_HEAD_NM_CHN = ? , FMLY_HEAD_RELN = ? , TEL_HOME1 = ? , TEL_HOME2 = ? , TEL_HOME3 = ? , CELPON_1 = ? , CELPON_2 = ? , CELPON_3 = ? , LIFE_BASE = ? , HOBY = ? , SPA_ABTY = ? , RELGN = ? , MTARY_GBN = ? , ARMY_GBN = ? , ADDR1 = ? , ADDR2 = ? , POST_NO = ? , PERMNT1 = ? , PERMNT2 = ? , PERMNT_POST_NO = ? , NATY_TEAM = ? , BUS_TEAM = ? , TRNG_PLC = ? , DRINK = ? , SMOKE = ? , GRDU_GBN = ? , LEAVE_DT = ? , LEAVE_RSN = ? , HGHT = ? , WGHT = ? , SIT_HGHT = ? , BREAST_SIZE = ? , BELLY_CIR = ? , HEAP_SIZE = ? , FEM_RIGHT = ? , FEM_LEFT = ? , LEG_RIGHT = ? , LEG_LEFT = ? , GLS_YN = ? , SIGHT_LEFT = ? , SIGHT_RIGHT = ? , BLOD_TPE = ? , RACER_TPE = ? , MAIN_ITEM = ? , STRATEGY = ? , LEG_TPE = ? , SUMM_PLC = ? , WIN_PLC = ? , TRNG_MAN = ? , STNT_OFFC_ER = ? , ROOM_CHIEF_YN = ? , PTO_FILE = ? , PTO_URL = ? , EMAIL = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , DEL_YN = ? WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?
UPDATE TBDB_CAND_IDENT SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBDB_FMLY ( RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, RES_NO, RELN, NM, SCHL, RES_AREA, FMLY_JOB, INST_ID, INST_DTM, SEQ )VALUES ( ? ,? ,FC_ENC(?) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDB_FMLY WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO=? AND CAND_NO=? ) )
UPDATE TBDB_FMLY SET RELN = ? , NM = ? , SCHL = ? , RES_AREA = ? , FMLY_JOB = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , RES_NO = FC_ENC(?) WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDB_FMLY WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDB_SCHL_CARR ( RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, SCHL_CD, MTRIC_YY, GRDU_YY, GRDU_GBN, SCHL_NM, MJR, INST_ID, INST_DTM, SEQ )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDB_SCHL_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO=? AND CAND_NO=? ) )
UPDATE TBDB_SCHL_CARR SET SCHL_NM = ? , MJR = ? , GRDU_GBN = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , SCHL_CD = ? , MTRIC_YY = ? , GRDU_YY = ? WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDB_SCHL_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDB_CARR ( RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, TOUR_DT, TOUR_NM, ITEM, RANK, INST_ID, INST_DTM, SEQ )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDB_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO=? AND CAND_NO=? ) )
UPDATE TBDB_CARR SET TOUR_NM = ? , ITEM = ? , RANK = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , TOUR_DT = ? WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDB_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDB_RACER_RELN ( RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, SEQ, NM, RACER_GBN, RELN_GBN, DETL_RELN, RMK, INST_ID, INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDB_RACER_RELN WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDB_RACER_RELN SET NM = ? , RACER_GBN = ? , RELN_GBN = ? , DETL_RELN = ? , RMK = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDB_RACER_RELN WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDB_INVW_CNTNT ( RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, DT, INVW_CNTNT, INVW_MAN, INST_ID, INST_DTM, SEQ )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDB_INVW_CNTNT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO=? AND CAND_NO=? ) )
UPDATE TBDB_INVW_CNTNT SET INVW_CNTNT = ? , INVW_MAN = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , DT = ? WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDB_INVW_CNTNT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
INSERT INTO TBDB_SPEC_DESC ( RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, SPEC_DESC, INST_ID, INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDB_SPEC_DESC SET SPEC_DESC = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_SCR ( RACER_PERIO_NO, CAND_NO, DT, SEQ, PRIZ_PENAL_GBN, ITEM_CD, PRIZ_PENAL_CD, DISC_CNTNT, PRIZ_SCR, PENAL_SCR, MANAGE_CNTNT, INST_ID, INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_SCR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_SCR SET , DT = ? , PRIZ_PENAL_GBN = ? , ITEM_CD = ? , PRIZ_PENAL_CD = ? , DISC_CNTNT = ? , PRIZ_SCR = ? , PENAL_SCR = ? , MANAGE_CNTNT = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDB_PRIZ_PENAL_SCR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND DT = ? AND SEQ = ?

-- SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(CAND_NO),5,8),0)+1,4,'0') AS SEQ -- FROM TBDB_CAND_IDENT -- WHERE SUBSTR(CAND_NO,1,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
SELECT A.RMK||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(B.CAND_NO),5,8),0)+1,4,'0') AS SEQ FROM TBDA_SPEC_CD A,TBDB_CAND_IDENT B WHERE A.CD_NM = B.RACER_PERIO_NO AND A.GRP_CD = 'A10001' AND TRIM(A.CD_NM) = ? GROUP BY RMK
